Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Arona (Los Cristianos), Sensimar Arona Gran Hotel & SPA - Adults Only is convenient to Los Cristianos Beach and Golf Las Americas. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Las Vistas Beach and Arona Pyramid.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 391 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies. High-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature bathrobes and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a nightclub, a fitness center, and bicycles to rent. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, a hair salon, and shopping on site.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Located in Arona (Los Cristianos), Sensimar Arona Gran Hotel & SPA - Adults Only is convenient to Los Cristianos Beach and Golf Las Americas. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Las Vistas Beach and Arona Pyramid.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Los Cristianos Beach - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Golf Las Americas - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Las Vistas Beach - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Arona Pyramid - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Veronicas Strip - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Magma Art and Congress Centre - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Golf Los Palos - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Siam Park - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Troya Beach - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Camel Park - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Torviscas Beach - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Aqualand Costa Adeje - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Puerto Colon - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Gran Sur Shopping Center - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Bobo Beach - 4.8 km / 3 mi

The preferred airport for Sensimar Arona Gran Hotel & SPA - Adults Only is Tenerife (TFS-Tenerife South) - 13 km / 8.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
